document_data.name: Cyrel
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cyrel''' was a [[wizard]] and a trader that operated out of a tollhouse situated along the [[Risen Road]] within the [[Sword Coast]] region during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Need any supplies? We've less mouths to feed since the [[gnoll]]s jumped us.|Cyrel.}}
document_data.Possessions: She wore simple robes and carried with her a mundane [[quarterstaff]], but offered a number of valuable items for sale or trade.
document_data.Relationships: For a time, she traveled alongside the fallen [[paladin]] of [[Tyr]] [[Anders]], the [[rogue]] [[Rurik]], and the [[ranger]] [[Trynn]].
document_data.History: Cyrel and her fellows were present at the Risen Road tollhouse when it was assaulted by [[gnoll]] raiders loyal to the [[cult of the Absolute]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. The group managed to fight off the savage beast-men, but could not save the lives of some innocent bystanders.
